WorkItem.Description:
Hi, my code for MvcMusicStore was working really well, I'm able to list all the Albums, Genres etc....The Edit, Details and Delete functionalities was working great as well. When I reached part 6 and added the changes or Data Annotations for Albums.cs model I started having issues. First on /Store the list of Genres was showing "Select from 0 genres:". Second, on /StoreManager/Index it only shows the headers but again the list is empty. I didn't make any changes to the SampleData.cs I just followed every step on the tutorial. One thing I noticed was on the MusicStoreEntities.cs it didn't say that I have to add the Artists DbSet, I just had to add it cause the code won't build.
Please help with this, I really want to finish the tutorial and now I'm stuck.
WorkItem.Summary: Data Missing after adding Data Annotations

Comments.Message: Okay here's how I fixed this issue. I wanted to just delete the MvcMusicStore.sdf so all the data would be refreshed but I had no luck finding the file. What I did was to delete the App_Data folder from the Project explorer and then rebuilt the app. Then I ran the app again and everything worked well.
